text: The Barbados men's cricket team is organised by the Barbados Cricket Association (BCA). Although it is the national team of Barbados, it does not play international matches. The BCA is a member of the West Indies Cricket Board (WICB), which represents several Caribbean nations in the International Cricket Council (ICC). Barbadians play internationally for the West Indies."The jewel of the Caribbean" â€“ ESPNcricinfo, 17 March 2006. Retrieved 20 January 2016. The team has been active since 1865. It plays its home matches at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown. ==References== Category:National sports teams of Barbados Category:First-class cricket teams in the West Indies
title: Barbados men's cricket team
